about.title: Innovative Full-Stack Developer and ERP Developer with over a year of hands-on experience, I specialize in building scalable applications that streamline business operations and enhance user experiences.
about.description: Passionate about turning complex problems into simple, effective digital solutions. I’m deeply driven by the blend of technology and design. Always exploring better ways to create impactful systems that empower users and make processes more efficient.

jobs.title: Back-end Developer
description: Coming soon...

companies.company: Institute of Science and Bussines Atma Luhur

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer & QA Tester
description: Developed and maintained a Student Funding Information System that digitized bureaucratic workflows for 17+ student organizations and 5 university officials, improving transparency and process efficiency.
Built 10+ core modules using Next.js 15 (App Router) and Laravel 12, ensuring scalability and clean architecture.
Authored and executed 500+ functional test cases covering form validation, role-based access control, and business logic.
Collaborated in an Agile team environment using Kanban boards, GitHub, and Figma to streamline communication and track progress.
Improved QA efficiency through automated validation checks, reducing manual testing time by 30%.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Conducted research and system analysis to support product improvement initiatives, accelerating decision-making by 20%.
Facilitated bi-weekly knowledge-sharing sessions, improving team alignment and collaboration among 5+ engineers.
Proposed 3 workflow enhancements, with 2 successfully implemented, boosting team efficiency by 20%.

jobs.title: Enterprise Resource Planning Developer
description: Refactored a legacy ERP codebase, removing 1,000+ redundant lines and reducing duplication by 35% for cleaner maintainability.
Optimized key business logic using hash-based lookups, improving time complexity from O(n²) to O(n) and increasing execution speed by 90%.
Enhanced UI responsiveness and navigation flow, resulting in a smoother and more consistent user experience.
Collaborated with backend engineers to improve data consistency and scalability.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer ERP
description: Developed and integrated ERP and DFD systems based on UI/UX prototypes, delivering the project 12.5% ahead of schedule.
Improved communication with the Product Manager, reducing workflow misunderstandings by 45%.
Conducted end-to-end testing and debugging of 5+ critical modules, enhancing system stability and performance.
Refactored backend and frontend code for better readability and reusability, improving overall maintainability by 30%.

jobs.title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Built and maintained face recognition and location validation (PNPOLY) features, improving attendance accuracy for clients.
Collaborated with backend developers to reduce application load times by 20%.
Created detailed feature documentation, cutting team errors by 30% and boosting productivity by 20%.
Led weekly 45-minute client meetings to ensure transparency and timely progress updates.
Presented project demos to clients, improving satisfaction and retention.

jobs.title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Responsible for slicing and building a company profile website.
Prepared presentations on 7+ frontend web development topics for weekly meetings.
Conducted 15-minute standing meetings to report progress.
Collaborated and fostered team bonding among a diverse team of 11+ members from various divisions.

items.title: detikcom | Learning Management System
items.description: A Learning Management System developed for detikcom to enhance internal learning and training efficiency. This platform enables seamless course management, learner engagement, and progress tracking in a structured and user-friendly environment. The project focuses on improving accessibility, collaboration, and digital transformation in corporate learning at detikcom

items.title: SIPEDAK | Student Activity Fund Management System
items.description: SIPEDAK is a web-based information system designed to streamline and digitize the entire process from proposal submission to financial accountability for student activities at ISB Atma Luhur. The system improves efficiency, reduces bureaucratic bottlenecks, and enhances transparency and accountability by providing an integrated platform for budgeting, revision tracking, and report generation.

items.title: Contrihub | detikcom Contributors Management System
items.description: The contributor management application is designed to streamline the management of news contributors, from registration and news verification to honor management.

items.title: Employee Attendance System
items.description: A freelance project aimed at creating a secure and efficient employee attendance system by combining face recognition technology (face-api.js) with location-based validation (pnpoly method).

items.title: Sorting-Visualization
items.description: A project aimed at visualizing the functionality of various sorting algorithms.

items.title: Todo-Apps
items.description: A simple todo app made with Vue and Vuex.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me for questions, inquiries, or collaborations. Open to new opportunities and challenges.

ok.title: Email sent
ok.description: I will get back to you as soon as possible!

error.title: Error
error.description: There was an error while submitting the email. Please try again later.

form.card-description: Please, fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

first-name.min: First name must be at least 2 characters.
first-name.max: First name must be less than 50 characters.
first-name.regex: First name must contain only letters.

last-name.min: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
last-name.max: Last name must be less than 50 characters.
last-name.regex: Last name must contain only letters.

email.email: Email must be a valid email address.
email.min: Email must be at least 5 characters.
email.max: Email must be less than 100 characters.

message.min: Message must be at least 10 characters.
message.max: Message must be less than 500 characters.
